name: toOne - Heads or Tails
description:
toOne is Coin toss Application.

"Supports up to Side Dish from Selection of Life"
Once in a while, try to determined by coin.

Toss
- Tap
- Shake(iPhone Only)
- Air-Gesture(front camera)

*We are aiming to design for easy-to-use. Banner ad will not appear at all.
Probability is changeable(optional)
